languages.text: "Послал нам Боженька-Император милость свою в темнейший час! И облачил во всеоружие гнева Его!"
"The God-Emperor has shown us leniency in our darkest hour! Praised be He who has arrayed us in the armour of His wrath!"
languages.original_text: "Послал нам Боженька-Император милость свою в темнейший час! И облачил во всеоружие гнева Его!"

traits.locale_text: "God-Emperor has shown us leniency in the darkest hour! Praised be the Exalted One, for he decked us in the armour of wrath!"
"God-Emperor has shown us leniency in the darkest hour! Praised be the Exalted One, for he decked us in the armour of wrath!"
"The God-Emperor has shown us leniency in our darkest hour! Praised be He who has arrayed us in the armour of His wrath!"
"The God-Emperor has shown us leniency in our darkest hour! Praised be He who has arrayed us in the armour of His wrath!"
"The God-Emperor has shown us leniency in our darkest hour! Praised be He who has arrayed us in the armour of His wrath!"

languages.text: “在这最黑暗的时刻，神皇赐予了我们祂的仁慈！祂派来了受到祝福的战士，身披着祂正义的怒火！”
languages.original_text: "The God-Emperor has shown us leniency in our darkest hour! Praised be He who has arrayed us in the armour of His wrath!"

traits.locale_text: “在这最黑暗的时刻，神皇赐予了我们祂的仁慈！祂派来了受到祝福的战士，身披着祂正义的怒火！”

languages.text: 「神帝陛下は我々が辛く苦しい時に慈悲を下さった！神の怒りの保護下に我らを置いて下さった神を讃えよ！」
languages.original_text: "The God-Emperor has shown us leniency in our darkest hour! Praised be He who has arrayed us in the armour of His wrath!"

traits.locale_text: 「神帝陛下は我々が辛く苦しい時に慈悲を下さった！神の怒りの保護下に我らを置いて下さった神を讃えよ！」

languages.text: « L'Empereur-Dieu s'est montré clément avec nous lorsque nous traversions des heures sombres ! Loué soit-Il pour nous avoir parés de l'armure de Son courroux ! »
languages.original_text: "The God-Emperor has shown us leniency in our darkest hour! Praised be He who has arrayed us in the armour of His wrath!"

traits.locale_text: « L'Empereur-Dieu s'est montré clément avec nous lorsque nous traversions des heures sombres ! Loué soit-Il pour nous avoir parés de l'armure de Son courroux ! »

languages.text: «Cuando parecía que llegaba nuestro fin, ¡el Dios Emperador ha sido misericordioso con nosotros! ¡Alabado sea aquel que nos ha protegido con su ira!».
languages.original_text: "The God-Emperor has shown us leniency in our darkest hour! Praised be He who has arrayed us in the armour of His wrath!"

traits.locale_text: «Cuando parecía que llegaba nuestro fin, ¡el Dios Emperador ha sido misericordioso con nosotros! ¡Alabado sea aquel que nos ha protegido con su ira!».

languages.text: "Der Gottimperator war in unserer dunkelsten Stunde nachsichtig mit uns! Gepriesen sei Er, der uns in die Rüstung Seines Zorns gehüllt hat!"
languages.original_text: "The God-Emperor has shown us leniency in our darkest hour! Praised be He who has arrayed us in the armour of His wrath!"

traits.locale_text: "Der Gottimperator war in unserer dunkelsten Stunde nachsichtig mit uns! Gepriesen sei Er, der uns in die Rüstung Seines Zorns gehüllt hat!"

languages.text: "Tanrı İmparator, en zor günümüzde bize merhamet eyledi! Gazabını bize kalkan eden O'na şükürler olsun!"
languages.original_text: "The God-Emperor has shown us leniency in our darkest hour! Praised be He who has arrayed us in the armour of His wrath!"

traits.locale_text: "Tanrı İmparator en zor günümüzde bize merhamet eyledi! Gazabının ardında bizi saklayan O'na şükürler olsun!"
